ygData.subject: Familiars...
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh yeah, almost forgot, to let you guys know, Familiars are a dumb idea, I mean HELLO, its a SUMMONED THING. If you all want to summon go play a Magician or
ygData.messageBody:
Oh yeah, almost forgot, to let you guys know, Familiars are a dumb idea,
I mean HELLO, its a SUMMONED THING. If you all want to summon go play a
Magician or crap, cmon, whats wrong with you ppl? We are WIZARDS! We
dont NEED anything else than what we have, also, on the subject of
grafix, yes, we have crappy grafix, thats really the only thing that is
kinda messed about a wizard, that and our spells not counting as "dmg"
that shows to other ppl :(
Well, I hope noone tries to do anything about familiars, this is why...
First, we ask Verant for stuff we know we wont get, like Familiars(wtf?
a SUMMON? for a WIZARD?) and crap. What do you think there gonna do if
we ever get a good idea? maybe they will look it over until another
class gets something fixed/boosted because all our comments up till then
would have been just dreams!(Remember the Boy who cried Wolf!?)
-Malvos
